ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: Allows you to last hit better.
ItemTooltips.boots: Every hero needs boots to run fast.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen for when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Good heal to help against harass.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Gives DPS, exactly what you need. Keep them on strength (red) unless you need more Mana, then put them on intelligence (blue).
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: If you can get it very fast, will give you lots of money.
ItemTooltips.refresher: Makes you very hard to kill.
ItemTooltips.assault: Gives good attack speed and armor, also has a good aura.
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives tons of HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Good HP and damage and allows you to not get stunned.
ItemTooltips.rapier: The only item you need if you can not die.
ItemTooltips.basher: Gives you good damage and HP as well as some stuns.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Gives very good DPS as well as more HP.
ItemTooltips.satanic: If you want tons of HP and lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Gives you stunning power and damage.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Gives you evasion and the ability to disarm enemy carries.

AbilityTooltips.skeleton_king_hellfire_blast: Good stun, use it to let you hit enemies.
AbilityTooltips.skeleton_king_vampiric_aura: Gives you lifesteal but scales badly, get it later on.
AbilityTooltips.skeleton_king_mortal_strike: A good skill for surviving and killing. Later on the crits give good damage. One point is enough early.
AbilityTooltips.skeleton_king_reincarnation: Brings you back to life. Try not to waste it.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Takes these early for more Mana, HP, and damage since you other skills are not useful in lane.
